q: Describe something you want to be better at
a:
One thing I want to be better at is reading faster. I enjoy reading, but sometimes it takes me a long time to finish a book or an article. I want to improve my reading speed without losing focus or understanding context. This would help me manage my time better and be more productive.

I have attended a speed-reading course before, but it was not very helpful for me. Maybe I didnâ€™t practice enough or find the right method for myself.
